attributes.action: Eliminate the possibility of Margret Thatcher on the new £50 polymer note.
attributes.background: Having an ex public figure who was extremely controversial, would be promoting the destructive legacy left behind after her terms as prime minister. The Fifty Pound polymer note should be promoting a public figure who has been an asset to our nation as a whole, not just for some.

rejection.details:
Not the Government/Parliament’s responsibility

Bank notes are the responsibility of the Bank of England, which is independent of the Government and Parliament.

You can find out how the Bank decides who will be on bank notes here: 
http://www.bankofengland.co.uk/banknotes/Pages/characters/selection.aspx
